Aug. 10, 1929 D Bridgwater Contest (1st Section)
Bridgwater Contest (1st Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Contest bridgwater-contest-1st-section
The Water Carrier
Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK Best Instrumentalist: J Curtis, Sidmouth Town Band
Prizes - 1st £20 and shield, 2nd £14, 3rd £8, 4th £5. 6 bands competed.
